name: LD41 BulletRogue (+3hours version)
description:
Bullet Rogue  (+3hours version)

  As a well respected rogue you invade yet another dungeon, but this time something is different... Your enemies are no usual goblins ! they are bullet hell fodder ! and the bosses ... oh the bosses...

 Controls

-  numpad/[Q,W,E,A,S,D,Z,X,C] to move
- space to use the equipped item
- 123/[J,K,L] to switch trough your inventory
